reviewText: I absolutely love these guys and gals! Les Mills is my favorite workout, and Body Combat is my favorite Les Mills!

If I had to do it again, I'd buy only this. Other than the Basic (how to) DVD and HIIT1 & HIIT2 DVDs... I don't use others. It all depends on what you are after but Warrior 1, Warrior 2 & Core Attack are total body workouts alone. Inner Warrior is similar to Yoga. Other DVDs other than HIIT1/HIIT2 are cardio. Wish I'd only bought this and found HIIT DVDs.
Es un buen producto, lo recomiendo, si podran reducir un poco el precio sera mejor. La entrega fue dentro del plazo pactado.

I  too purchased Les Mills Combat as soon as it became available. I was so excited to start this program. I did this program after completing insanity. I loved insanity don't get me wrong, but it's not something you can maintain for a long time. It gave me great results I will say that. Anyways, back to Combat, this is the BEST workout I have ever done. The instructors are awesome, and extremely motivating. This program comes with 3 schedules which I think is great. I started with the 2 nd schedule and found it to be amazing. However, I wanted more. So I purchased these extra DVDS and I LOVE them. The stretch DVD is great and LOVE core attack. These workouts are truly amazing. I found my soulmate workout for sure. I look forward to working out, and I am not making this up! Plus Dan is so hot! Sorry had to put that in there. But, honestly buy this workout you WILL NOT be disappointed.

I purchased all LesMills DVD's as soon as they became available. I just love the workouts, the trainers and the music. Even for someone who has martial arts experience, these workouts are a challenge.
